headline: Nepotism 60 hour work weeks and 11pm weekend demands
pros: customers bring in food, management has no clue so you can do whatever you want.
cons: Nepotism, no review process in place so nobody ever gets a raise. You can work there years and be great at what you do and never ever be considered for a raise, this all changes if you are family or friends of the family though.

headline: Professional and Reputable Mortgage Company
pros: Caring leadership, professional atmosphere, great reputation, the kind of place to make a career in mortgage
cons: had only 1 underwriter when I was there, creating delays in processing files
